title: Spotlight: The FundedNext Ramadan Premiere (15% OFF)
description: Premiere Event: The Ramadan 2026 Spotlight is here. FundedNext takes the lead with epic price reductions across their Stellar lineup. Scene 1: Use code HOLY15 for a 15% drop (2k-25k) or HOLY10 for a 10% premiere deal (50k-200k). High-end production trading for the cinematic elite. Spotlight: ACTIVE.
forbidden_strategies: You must use the same trading strategy and method (manual or EA) during both the Challenge and Funded Account. Switching between them is not allowed.
Utilizing specific asset classes
symbol categories

specific margin or risk usages to pass the evaluation phase and then switching to entirely different asset classes or symbol categories and significantly increasing the margin utilization or risk usages in the FundedNext Account
is prohibited.
Account rolling is strictly prohibited
buying multiple evaluations to sacrifice some while passing others is considered a high-risk
luck-based tactic that violates FundedNext\u2019s principles of skill and responsible trading. Violations may lead to restrictions on new purchases or lifetime allocation limits.
One-sided Betting: One-Sided Betting is a gambling-like trading behavior where a trader takes concentrated directional exposure
opens multiple trades in the same direction
or enters reactive positions without sufficient consideration of market conditions
fundamental news
or technical analysis

Grid Trading: Grid trading is a strategy where a trader places multiple buy and sell orders at different price levels above and below the current market price. The goal is to profit from price fluctuations as the market moves up and down
hitting various price points.
Other prohibited trading strategies: https://help.fundednext.com/en/articles/8020351-what-are-the-restricted-prohibited-trading-strategies?q=risk

payout_policy.minimum_payout: Important Note: If payout is below $20, you can't withdraw.
payout_schedules: frequency: Bi-Weekly (withdrawal after 14 days with minimum 1% profit) }
payout_limits: USDT (ERC20) and USDC (ERC20): Lowest Payout Amount: $50
Payout Limits for TC Pay: Lowest Payout Amount: $20

firm_rules.copy_trading: Copy trading is only allowed between challenge accounts and between instant accounts.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: EAs are only available as an add-on. EAs are allowed, only works on MetaTrader 4 and MetaTrader 5. EA must be customized to suit your trading style. Identical trades across accounts are not allowed. Switching between EA and manual trading is not allowed. There is a maximum allocation limit of $300,000 for each EA or trading bot's strategy.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: To avoid the account inactivity period, traders can simply login to their account at least once or execute a single trade within a period of 30 consecutive days.
firm_rules.news_trading: Allowed without restriction during evaluation stage. Allowed with restriction on funded stage and instant accounts (Trades executed 5 minutes before and after a High Impact News event are subject to a 40% news profit split rule.)
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Allowed (News trading allowed with 40% split rule on funded/instant).

seo_content:
FundedNext Technical Infrastructure

FundedNext, based in the United Arab Emirates, was established in March 2022. The firm is a CFD provider offering 1 Step and 2 Steps program types. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $200,000. Platforms supported include cTrader, MT4 and MT5. Tradable instruments include Forex, Commodities and Indices, with leverage options up to 1:100 for majors, exotics, and cryptocurrencies. FundedNext has a 4.6/5 review score based on 14,350 reviews. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: FundedNext Full Report: Leverage, Rules & Payouts
youtube_metadata.description: Complete technical breakdown of FundedNext. We analyze their forex environment and execution rules.
